description: Chef Tom Stec with 23 years experience decided to moved from Chicago and run Tomski Sausage gourmet food truck, offering the best Chicago street food in Los Angeles.  Serving the best original polish kielbasa, italian beef, homemade pierogi, cheese blintzes and more. Besides the regular menu we can customize custom catering offers a variety of dishes. We can prepare anything that you crave and thrive on the excitement of creating new dishes to compliment particular themes. We can customize a menu that fits your event and budget. Please check our website for our daily schedule, specials. Fallow us on twitter @sausagetomski, instagram & facebook: tomskisausage.
name: Tomski Sausage
